column5: Welcome to our charming home on beautiful Cedar Creek Lake where you can enjoy swimming, kayaking, fishing, amazing sunsets and pure relaxation. Cedar Creek Lake is located about 60 miles SE of Dallas, Tx, about a one hour drive from DFW airport. This is a shared home. Alan and I may be home during your stay. Our bedroom is located downstairs separate from he Airbnb space. If you are interested in a full house rental please let us know and we can give you pricing.
column8: Living the "simple life" at Cedar Creek Lake!
